config.response_template: {     {% if body.ListedMerchants and #body.ListedMerchants > 0 then %}         "addresses":[            {% for i, address in ipairs(body.ListedMerchants[1].MerchantAddressList) do %}                {                    "id": {{address.Id}},                    {% if address.AddressType then %}                    "typeId": {{address.AddressType.Id}},                    "typeName": "{{address.AddressType.Name}}",                    {% else %}                    "typeId": null,                    "typeName": null,                    {% end %}                    {% if address.City then %}                    "cityId": {{address.City.Id}},                    "cityName": "{{address.City.Name}}",                    "stateName": "{{address.City.StateName}}",                    {% if address.City.Country then %}                    "countryId": {{address.City.Country.Id}},                    "countryName": "{{address.City.Country.Name}}",                    {% end %}                    {% else %}                    "cityId": null,                    "cityName": null,                    "countryId": null,                    "countryName": null,                    {% end %}                    "complement": "{{address.Complement}}",                    "locatedInShopping": {{address.LocatedInShopping}},                    "neighborhood": "{{address.Neighborhood}}",                    "postalCode": "{{address.PostalCode}}",                    "reference": "{{address.Reference}}",                    "streetName": "{{address.StreetName}}",                    "streetNumber": "{{address.StreetNumber}}",                    "streetTypeId": {{address.StreetTypeId}}                {% if i == #body.ListedMerchants[1].MerchantAddressList then %}                }                {% else %}                },                {% end %}            {% end %}        ],    {% end %}    "messages": {% if body.Message then %} ["{{body.Message}}"] {% else %} [] {% end %} }
